function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of coordination and data sharing for managing current and future outbreaks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gps traces wrong location due to satellite signal blockage by concrete structures.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gps errors due to storms, radio interference, and hardware or software faults.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile technology for covid-19 contact tracing and monitoring.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for unauthorized access to personal data via bluetooth","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bluejacking and spam via bluetooth","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns with bluetooth contact tracing for covid-19","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mass surveillance from covid-19 apps","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Device competence limitations in underdeveloped nations","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disclosure of personal information of affected persons","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and data security issues in contact tracing applications","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ethical considerations in technology development","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation of digital proximity in storing user situations may lead to ineffective covid-19 tracking.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of location and personal data by contact tracing apps threatens fundamental human rights.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in source code for surveillance applications.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High number of false positives in bluetooth tracing apps due to aired bluetooth chips.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation of mhealth accessibility due to technical dependency and network connectivity","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data security and privacy concerns in managing personal health data online","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accuracy in over-phone contact tracing measurements","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 impact on education and training, leading to cancellations and reliance on online technology","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on mobile technology for group counseling and health advice","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring of covid-19 patients using gps and bluetooth technology in smartphones","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of smartphone technology for diagnosis and imaging may lead to misinterpretation of medical images and misdiagnosis of contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telemedicine and mobile technology for healthcare consultations may result in inadequate physical examination and assessment of contagious diseases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile technology for counseling and education may result in misinformation and inadequate guidance on self-isolation and protection from contagious diseases.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through mobile technology usage in healthcare and social settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on mobile technology for healthcare may lead to data breaches and privacy concerns","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential overload of healthcare systems due to increased reliance on mobile technology for diagnosis and treatment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in face-to-face consultations during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of smartphone technology for covid-19 data and information updates","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of economic and social wellbeing due to covid-19 impact","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of variables that increase pandemic difficulty and cause spread of covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proactive assessment of future outbreak chances based on current infection and death rates.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient monitoring of mobility and contact data for understanding disease spread during future outbreaks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile apps for tracking covid-19 transmission","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gps and bluetooth technology used for tracking covid-19 patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection and storage of personal health and travel data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Notification alert for vicinity near red zone based on user location","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission through proximity contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation and infodemic through social media","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of traceability and fact-checking in encrypted messaging platforms","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data security in mobile applications for covid-19 surveillance","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective contact tracing leading to virus transmission","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and accountability in data administration","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of personal data such as national identity number, passport number, phone number, travel history, and health status.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of gps, wi-fi, and bluetooth to track user’s movements and interactions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Centralized storage of transaction details, calls, and messages.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Storage of gps history and wi-fi information","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cross-referencing user’s location with
